content.text: SNIPER: listen - Simple Network Listener & Server

text: A versatile network utility with two modes:
1. A raw [bold]TCP listener[/] to capture incoming data, useful for debugging or simple shells.
2. A simple [bold]HTTP server[/] to quickly share files from the current directory.
[cyan]<PORT>[/]               The port number to listen on.
[green]--serve[/]             [bold]HTTP Server Mode.[/] Starts a simple file server.
[green]--log <filename>[/]   [bold]TCP Listener Mode.[/] Log all received data to a file.
[green]-h, --help[/]         Show this help message and exit.
